_source.short_desc: CentralReach is a leading EMR, practice management and data collection platform for Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy providers.
_source.long_desc: CentralReach is the leading Autism and IDD Care Software trusted by over 1,600 Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) practices and other therapy providers. The web-based, HIPAA-compliant system offers practice management, clinical, and EMR solutions. It integrates scheduling, billing, claims, clinical data collection, clinical programming, a mobile app, and more, with access to autism and IDD assessments, a learning management system, precision teaching solutions, and managed billing services.
_source.target_audience: Midsize to large ABA therapy practices needing practice management and clinical data collection solutions. Business intelligence, learning management and managed billing solutions are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Mend is the Leading Telehealth, Digital Patient Intake, &  Patient Engagement Platform. Reduce no-show rates & engage more patients.
related_products.features:
Telehealth, Patient Engagement, & Complete Digital Patient Management: Automated Patient Payments, Appointment Reminders, AI-Predicted No Shows, Enhanced Virtual Waiting Room, Patient Self-Scheduling & Digital Forms. #1 Rated Support & Custom Workflows. 

Mend Has 98.3% Engagement, 99.85% Video Connection, & Single Digit No-Show Rates.

Mend Has Automation Technology To Integrate With Any EHR, PMS, or Other Systems. Perfect Fit For Large Provider Groups.

related_products.short_desc: ABAdesk is an affordable platform offering intuitive data collection, graphing, session notes, and treatment planning.
related_products.features: ABAdesk is an easy-to-use platform that enables clinicians to shift the focus back to progress. With its intuitive data collection, automatic program updates, graphing, session notes, and treatment planning features, clinicians are able to make a greater impact while maintaining work-life balance. ABAdesk is a contract-free service, priced to allow for maximum accessibility.

related_products.short_desc: Applied behavior analysis solution that enables users to manage scheduling, billing, data collection, payroll reporting, and more.
related_products.features: Theralytics is a practice management and data collection software designed for ABA providers. Theralytics takes care of billing, payroll, scheduling, documentation management and much more on a user-friendly, affordable, and HIPAA compliant platform.

related_products.short_desc: ABA Therapy & Behavioral Health practice management solutions. Includes ABA Data Collection, RBT Training, Billing & Scheduling.
related_products.features: Rethink Behavioral Health delivers a  technology platform built specifically for managing autism and developmental disorders. The robust EMR and billing service is an all-in-one, HIPAA-compliant technology that includes EVV to simplify ABA data collection, advanced video-based RBT training for staff, and scheduling tools. Rethink also offers the industry's first evidence-based calculator for the recommended range of treatment hours for a particular child's behavioral profile.

related_products.short_desc: An advanced data suite for ABA, and a complete EHR built to simplify clinical and administrative tasks for ABA practices.
related_products.features: Noteable offers a data suite for ABA as well as a complete EHR and practice management solution that includes the data suite. The Noteable Data Suite is designed for accuracy and treatment fidelity with 8 collector types, advanced analysis tools and an emphasis on individualization of goals and objectives. The Noteable EHR adds notes, reports, supervision workflows and billing, all customizable by program, as well as hipaa compliant telehealth, e-faxing, scheduling and more.

related_products.short_desc: Behaviorsoft is an all-in-one clinical and practice management technology solution designed for small independent ABA providers.
related_products.features: Behaviorsoft is an all-in-one clinical and practice management technology solution designed specifically for small independent ABA providers. With Behaviorsoft you can automate painful daily tasks and streamline clinical care and practice operations - meaning your clinical team can focus on delivering the best care possible to your clients and each office team member can effectively and painlessly do the work of two.

related_products.short_desc: MedEZ is a perfect fit for Behavioral Healthcare facilities, Inpatient and Outpatient IOP / PHP programs & substance abuse clinics.
related_products.features: MedEZ provides fully integrated, user-friendly EHR, clinical notes & billing solution for medium to enterprise level behavioral health: inpatient psychiatric facilities, outpatient IOP/PHP programs & substance abuse clinics. MedEz includes everything from appointment scheduling to clinical notes, billing & documentation management. MedEz has In-House Pharmacy, Med Inventory, Med Dispensing, MARS, & ePharmacy features as well as handles state required documentation & reporting easily.

related_products.short_desc: WellSky Rehabilitation (formerly MediLinks) is a web-based solution ideal for practices of 20+ therapists, supporting PT, OT, SLP, and
related_products.features: WellSky Rehabilitation (formerly MediLinks) is the web-based rehab EHR that goes beyond basic functions like documentation and billing to offer centralized scheduling, prioritized workflow management, and practice management reporting. A deep library of documentation templates support PT, OT, SLP, and pediatrics. The latest release of WellSky Rehabilitation embraces the principles developed from WellSky's 25 years of work with the biggest names in rehab.

related_products.short_desc: Web-based applied behavior analysis solution that enables businesses to manage scheduling, billing, data collection, and more.
related_products.features: AccuPoint is a web-based platform that manages scheduling, payroll, billing, RCM, data collection, and documentation of services for home and community based health care providers including but not limited to, ABA, EI, Waiver, and Home Care.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based system that helps behavior analysts manage patient scheduling, billing, data across ABA therapy clinics.
related_products.features: Total Therapy is a fully integrated system designed for pediatric therapy clinics. Our easy to use and flexible software solution includes Practice Management, Data Collection, Billing Options, Mobile App, and a Patient Portal. Built on the secure and reliable Salesforce platform, Total Therapy allows the flexibility to customize to your current needs and scale with your growing therapy practice.

similar_products.short_desc: Embark EMR is setting a new precedence in EMR functionality and affordability.  Accelerate your practice for just $20/month!
similar_products.features:
Embark EMR is setting a new precedence in EMR functionality and affordability.  At just $20/month with no hidden fees, users are able to grow their practice without the high fees.

Embark is a secure HIPAA compliant EMR solution specifically designed for therapists and counselors.  Includes scheduling, documentation, patient management, note templates, progress notes, custom branded patient portal, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Marketing analytics software for digital agencies.
similar_products.features: Marketing analytics software for digital agencies.

similar_products.short_desc: Kareo a Tebra Company makes it easy to engage with your patients. Build notes and managing patient interactions simply with Kareo EHR!
similar_products.features: Kareo a Tebra Company offers a full-featured EHR designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Kareo Clinical is MACRA Certified. Built for the iPad and the web, it gives you great flexibility and the freedom to stay connected with your patient during an exam. Kareo EHR is built for YOU - not just MU (although it's ONC-ACB Certified). Take the worries out of adopting an EHR with Kareo a Tebra Company.

similar_products.short_desc: Therabill is a web-based billing software for physical, occupational, and speech therapists. It integrates with the WebPT EMR.
similar_products.features: Therabill is an all-in-one, web-based practice management software for behavioral and mental health specialists, developmental therapists, social workers, psychologists, nutritionists, and speech-language pathologists. Features include documentation with customizable templates and in-system faxing; scheduling and automatic appointment reminders; and unlimited electronic claim submissions to thousands of insurance companies and government payers.

similar_products.short_desc: ChartLogic offers a full ambulatory EHR suite designed to intuitively understand your workflow, specialty and personal preference.
similar_products.features: ChartLogic, Inc. offers a full ambulatory EHR suite, including electronic medical record, practice management, revenue cycle management, e-Rx, patient portal and more. ChartLogic delivers everything you need to accurately and efficiently manage administrative and financial tasks, including registration and scheduling; eligibility and verification; claims, billings and collections; user dashboards and reports. ChartLogic PM automates a variety of routine tasks, and alerts you to probable errors.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Portal software makes it possible for healthcare providers and hospitals to securely connect and communicate with patients online. With Patient Portal software, your patients can take care of their billing and invoicing, view their electronic health records and fill out important intake and insurance forms. Looking for other innovative software to manage your medical practice? Check out Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software, and Patient Management software.
